tree.name: Jalen Duren
tree.tradeDescription: 3-team trade: Pistons acquired Jalen Duren (#13) and Kemba Walker from Knicks, sent 2025 MIL 1st round pick (top-4 protected) to New York
tree.note: Center from Memphis, drafted 13th overall by Charlotte, traded to Detroit via New York

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 MIL 1st Round Pick (top-4 protected)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Acquired from Portland in Jerami Grant trade, then sent to New York Knicks
assetsGivenUp.note: Originally acquired from Portland in the Jerami Grant trade (Jul 6, 2022). Conveyed as #19 pick in 2025, selected Nolan Traore.

assetsGivenUp.name: Jerami Grant
assetsGivenUp.note: Forward, acquired via sign-and-trade from Denver

assetsGivenUp.name: Cash considerations
assetsGivenUp.note: Sign-and-trade, Detroit sent only cash/trade exception to Denver

tradeChain.name: 2022 CHA 1st Round Pick (#13)
tradeChain.tradeDescription: Pistons sent 2025 MIL 1st round pick to Knicks, received #13 pick (Jalen Duren, drafted by Charlotte) and Kemba Walker
tradeChain.note: Charlotte drafted Duren #13, sent to Detroit via New York in 3-team draft night trade

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 MIL 1st Round Pick (protected)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Acquired from Trail Blazers in Jerami Grant trade (Jul 6, 2022)
assetsGivenUp.note: Milwaukee's 2025 1st round pick (top-4 protected), sent to NYK then to BKN in Bridges trade, became #19 Nolan Traore

assetsGivenUp.name: Jerami Grant
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Sign-and-trade: Pistons signed Grant to 3-year $60M deal, Nuggets received trade exception and cash
assetsGivenUp.note: Forward acquired via sign-and-trade from Denver
